New Records: Zaccharie Risacher tallied career highs with 33 points and seven rebounds
Key Match Events: The game was tied 110-110 with 1:31 remaining
Atlanta took the lead for good on a pair of free throws and a dunk from Clint Capela
Post-Match Reflections: Risacher made five 3-pointers and scored 22 in the first half and helped the Hawks take a 65-61 lead at the break
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hawks end a three-game home-court losing streak to the Knicks
The Knicks played without Precious Achiuwa and Cameron Payne
Atlanta was missing De’Andre Hunter, Bogdan Bogdanovic, Kobe Bufkin, and Vit Krejci
Others: The first of four meetings between the teams
They don’t play again until Jan. 20 in New York
